item.title: Scraping two-column PDFs
item.description: What I was trying to do Scrape text from PDFs where the text was laid out in two columns. What I tried first: pdftools and readr Many text scraping tutorials in R recommend using pdftools to extract text from a PDF file. So far, so straightforward. library(pdftools) library(tidyverse) text <- pdf_text("my_file.pdf") That results in a character vector, but it still needs cleaning – each element in the vector is a chunk of text, and there’s loads of whitespace throughout.
